To bring archery closer to the hearts of Filipinos by making it an accessible sport for everyone
To provide facilities and equipment for different kinds of archers
To produce archers and champions who could represent the Gandiva brand and the country
To be the leader in our craft by providing quality but affordable products and services
To advocate health and wellness by promoting the mental and physical benefits of archery
Archery as a health and wellness lifestyle that is close to the hearts of Filipinos.
Applying membership will cost 2000 pesos. You will get notification when you get accepted. Apply Now!
Thank you! Your payment is sending wait to finish the upload to update your payment. Wait for the confirmation if valid or not.
\tYour reservation has been successfully send. Please pay the reservation fee so your reservation can be accept.
Fill out the Form with Smart ID Number. 5577-5193-3461-2109
In the amount. Write the amount you pay with the minimum of PHP 200.
In your Mobile App. Click My Reservation then in Pending Tab click the Reservation you want to pay then click "Please pay your reservation fee".
Click the Logo of Smart Padala Logo
Fill out the Contact Number, Reference Number, Amount.
Attach the picture of your receipt.Then Click Pay!
Then wait for the confirmation from the Arrowland if your payment is valid or not!
Fill out Pera Padala Form with recipient Jimmeer Bernabe.
In the amount. Write the amount you pay with the minimum of PHP 200.
In your Mobile App. Click My Reservation then in Pending Tab click the Reservation you want to pay then click "Please pay your reservation fee".
Click the Logo of Cebuana Lhuiller
Fill out the Sender name, Control Number, Amount.
Attach the picture of your receipt.Then Click Pay!
Then wait for the confirmation from the Arrowland if your payment is valid or not!
Your application is still pending .Please pay your lesson fee in the Arrowland SM-North to accept your application.You will get notified when your application get accepted.
